section.title: Description
section.p: "A community of people composed of one or more nationalities and possessing a more or less defined territory and government." – Merriam-Webster. An organization created to govern a country, which has the power to grant citizenship to its people.

stentry.p: "Contains the information related to a person's country citizenship. For country citizenship HL7 recommends using ISO table 3166...." - HL7 Version 2.8, PID-26.
"Identif(ies) the next of kin/associated party's citizenship." - HL7 Version 2.8, NK1-19.
